extendedInfo.description: Have an appetite for words and pictures? Can you guess the picture based on part of the picture shown? Reveal the picture piece by piece and guess what's in the picture!Guess the Picture is #1 smash-hit word puzzle game. Let your imagination run wild in this groundbreaking game. Guess the Picture is everyoneâs new favorite game. Find out why now!Game Features:- Simple and familiar gameplay you know and love- Improved the classic game with a whole new look and feel- Unlimited Fun: 300 of pictures to guess and more to comeNotes: Photos are provided by www.fotolia.com. See bottom of the picture for detailed copyright information of the respective photographer.

reviews.title: A good game but.......
reviews.comment: .......after playing for a lot of time getting bored...give more levels and a 5 star.
reviews.author: Jash Shah

reviews.title: Fun! Easy!
reviews.comment: Really simple but fun
reviews.author: Amanda Inglis

reviews.title: Fun for all ages.
reviews.comment: My 8 year old loves this  game.  It is fun when we play together. Thanx!
reviews.author: Stacy Nelson

reviews.title: Fun & Easy
reviews.comment: The game is fun & easy for the whole family to enjoy.
reviews.author: Heather Konieczny

reviews.title: Simple, easy, fun!
reviews.comment: This game is easy but addictive. Great way ti pass time.
reviews.author: Crystal Keith

reviews.title: Fun, challenging, but not truly free.
reviews.comment: I love the challenge. Some pics are beautiful. I was annoyed to find, like many other games, if one uses all the hints, you are required to buy more hints. This does not make it totally free...
reviews.author: Jeanne Magers

reviews.title: Always fun
reviews.comment: Nice to learn new words and its a tension free game I feel fresh after playing dis game......... Just enjoying.........
reviews.author: manju l

reviews.title: Guess the picture
reviews.comment: Fun to play when bored I also like to guess the pic.   with only a few blocks opened.  I give 5 star
reviews.author: Patti I.Rodriguez

reviews.title: Super fun!!! Kid friendly- great learning game!!
reviews.comment: This would be a great app for home schoolers to practice thinking, predicting and spelling!!
reviews.author: Jacquelyn Goad

reviews.title: Fun!!!
reviews.comment: This is a fun game, even for kiddos. Its easy however somewhat challenging. I like that they don\'t ask for real money for more clues, you earn coins to buy extra guesses.
reviews.author: mindy fussner

reviews.title: It is fabulous
reviews.comment: This is written by my 6 year old son.  This game is fun.  It is great help with my spelling.  I like playing with my parents.
reviews.author: Bruce Anderson

reviews.title: Great Game But Limited
reviews.comment: I love this game but after you complete all levels there\'s nothing left to do but uninstall it. No reason to purchase the extra coin option because there are no other levels added.
reviews.author: Constance Banks

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I downloaded this game yesterday and have already completed it. It is an enjoyable game. There needs to be a 2nd one or at least more levels :)
reviews.author: Richard Smylie

reviews.comment: Prretty good, more fun guessing before revealing. CAN\'T BELIEVE YOU USED AN IMAGE OF SOMEBODY SMOKING. NOT COOL!
reviews.author: Robin Knight

reviews.comment: This game good,nice,fun,great,awesome everybody should try it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I would recommend this game to all those out there if your looking for some simple fun. Its pretty easy so far that\'s my only complant as of yet
reviews.author: Christina Ryan

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Theres this other app called unbrick-A-pic which let\'s you make your own levels for a friend to play. Search it!
reviews.author: Hamzah Malik

reviews.title: fun game
reviews.comment: not too easy, not too hard. keeps your brain sharp. must play!
reviews.author: coleen la bianco

reviews.title: Lots of Fun
reviews.comment: This game is a lot of fun and it\'s child friendly. It teaches problem solving and spelling. Awesome!
reviews.author: Sylvia Patton

reviews.title: Uncomplicated & entertaining.
reviews.comment: A nice simple app, easy to use & a fun way to unwind.  :-)
reviews.author: Tina Mangino
